summary: An Ordinance accepting a deed of conveyance from Elizabeth McGilvra, Oliver C. McGilvra, Lillian L. McGilvra, Carrie E. Burke and Oliver C. McGilvra and Charles L. Denny as executors of the last will and estate of John J. McGilvra, deceased, to certain portion of Lot One (1), Block "G" of A. A. Denny's Addition, and laying off and establishing a public street and highway over the land thereby conveyed.
